title: Mahathir Mohamad’s Legacy: Triumph Over Health Battles and Political Turbulence (2025 Update) – THAI.NEWS – Thailand Breaking News
snippet: December 3, 2025 · We provide the latest breaking news, and information straight from Thailand. open menu · Back · By Editorial Team on July 14, 2025 · In the heart of Southeast Asia, where the vibrant cultures and historical landmarks boast stories as colorful as its sunsets, a man by the name of Mahathir Mohamad stands as a testament to endurance and resilience.
